data.comment: The match has started.
Throw-in for Necaxa in their own half.
In the minute 3, Throw-in Tigres.
Throw-in for Tigres at Estadio Victoria.
Necaxa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 5, Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Tigres in the half of Necaxa.
Free kick for Necaxa in their own half.
In the minute 7, Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards Tigres a goal kick.
Necaxa have a goal kick.
Necaxa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 10, It's a goal kick for the away team in Aguascalientes.
Necaxa have been awarded a corner by Eduardo Galvan Basulto.
Throw-in high up the field for Tigres in Aguascalientes.
In the minute 12, In Aguascalientes Tigres drive forward through Luis Quinones. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Tigres.
In Aguascalientes Necaxa's Angel Malagon is caught offside.
In the minute 14, Goal! Tigres take a 0-1 lead through a well-placed header from Andre Pierre Gignac.
Luis Quinones instrumental with a fine assist.
Tigres have been awarded a corner by Eduardo Galvan Basulto.
In the minute 17, Tigres are coming forward and Andre Pierre Gignac gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Necaxa at Estadio Victoria.
Necaxa to take a throw-in in Tigres territory.
In the minute 19, Tigres's Luis Rodriguez gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Necaxa defender.
Corner awarded to Tigres.
Eduardo Vargas gets his shot on target but fails to score for Tigres.
In the minute 21, Corner awarded to Tigres.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Necaxa in their own half.
Free kick for Necaxa in their own half.
In the minute 24, Free kick Necaxa.
Necaxa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Necaxa in their own half.
In the minute 28, Ball safe as Tigres is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Tigres's Andre Pierre Gignac misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Necaxa goal kick.
In the minute 32, Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a Tigres throw-in in Necaxa's half.
Can Tigres get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Necaxa's half?
Tigres's Luis Quinones has run offside.
In the minute 33, Eduardo Vargas for Tigres gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Aguascalientes.
Necaxa's Maximiliano Salas gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 35, Goal kick for Tigres at Estadio Victoria.
Necaxa needs to be cautious. Tigres have an attacking throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 38, David Cabrera is booked for the home team.
Eduardo Vargas puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 0-2.
That's a fine assist from Javier Aquino.
In the minute 41, Throw-in for Tigres in the half of Necaxa.
Free kick for Necaxa in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Estadio Victoria.
The second-half has started.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 46, Tigres awarded a free kick in their own half.
Necaxa's David Cabrera is whistled for offside at Estadio Victoria.
Necaxa have a goal kick.
In the minute 49, Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Tigres in their own half.
Jairo Gonzalez is replacing Raul Sandoval for Necaxa at Estadio Victoria.
Necaxa make their second substitution with Joao Rodriguez replacing Yerko Leiva.
In the minute 50, Luis Alfonso Sosa is making the team's third substitution at Estadio Victoria with Ricardo Chavez replacing Carlos Guzman.
Tigres awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Necaxa in their own half.
In the minute 52, In Aguascalientes a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in Necaxa.
Ball safe as Tigres is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 53, Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Tigres.
Can Tigres get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Necaxa's half?
Tigres drive upfield and Andre Pierre Gignac gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Necaxa defender.
In the minute 56, Tigres have been awarded a corner by Eduardo Galvan Basulto.
Throw-in for Tigres in the half of Necaxa.
Necaxa have been awarded a corner by Eduardo Galvan Basulto.
In the minute 58, Throw-in for Tigres at Estadio Victoria.
Free kick for Tigres in the half of Necaxa.
Ball goes out of play for a Tigres goal kick.
In the minute 61, Necaxa's Maximiliano Salas breaks free at Estadio Victoria. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards Tigres a goal kick.
In Aguascalientes Necaxa attack through Martin Barragan. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 62, Ball goes out of play for a Tigres goal kick.
Tigres awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Necaxa in their own half.
In the minute 63, Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a Necaxa throw-in in Tigres's half.
In Aguascalientes a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Necaxa in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Aguascalientes.
In the minute 66, The home team replace Jose Cobian with Ian Gonzalez.
In Aguascalientes, Martin Barragan of Necaxa is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 68, Important block from the Tigres defence as Maximiliano Salas fires in a strike for Necaxa.
Corner awarded to Necaxa.
Goal kick for Tigres at Estadio Victoria.
In the minute 71, Tigres have been awarded a corner by Eduardo Galvan Basulto.
Necaxa pushes forward through Joao Rodriguez, whose finish on goal is saved.
Free kick for Necaxa in their own half.
In the minute 73, Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Necaxa.
Tigres awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Necaxa.
In the minute 75, Throw-in Tigres.
Free kick for Tigres in the half of Necaxa.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Tigres in their own half.
In the minute 78, Tigres's Andre Pierre Gignac gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Victoria. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Goal! Andre Pierre Gignac extends Tigres's lead to 0-3.
In the minute 80, Necaxa to take a throw-in in Tigres territory.
The away team have replaced Eduardo Vargas with Leonardo Fernandez. This is the first substitution made today by Ricardo Ferretti.
Corner awarded to Necaxa.
Tigres have a goal kick.
In the minute 82, Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards Necaxa a goal kick.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Necaxa in their own half.
Ricardo Ferretti (Tigres) is making a second substitution, with Jorge Torres replacing Jesus Duenas.
In the minute 84, Ball goes out of play for a Tigres goal kick.
Goal kick for Tigres at Estadio Victoria.
In Aguascalientes Tigres attack through Jorge Torres. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 86, Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards Necaxa a goal kick.
Can Necaxa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tigres's half?
In Aguascalientes a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 89, Free kick Necaxa.
Ricardo Chavez is back on the pitch.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Aguascalientes.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Tigres.
Tigres push forward at Estadio Victoria and Guido Pizarro gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Necaxa defence.
In Aguascalientes a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Tigres awarded a free kick in their own half.
The second-half is over. The match ends 0-3.
The match at Estadio Victoria has been interrupted briefly for a check on Ricardo Chavez, who is down injured.
